st: Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
s:
Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
Too Aansu Na Bahana Toh Eh Dost,

Zeevan Chaahe Tadap Bhi Jaaye,
To Phir Bhi Naa Tu Pyar Jataana….

st: Wo Dil Kya Kare Jo Milne Ki Dua Na Kare,
s:
Wo Dil Kya Kare Jo Milne Ki Dua Na Kare,
Tujko Bhool Kar Jiyun Khuda Na Kare,
Hogi Teri Yaari Meri Zindagi Bhar Ki Liya,
Yeh Baat Aur Hai Ke Zindagi Wafa Na Kare…

st: Pyar Karne Walon Ki Kismat Kharab Hoti Hai,
s:
Pyar Karne Walon Ki Kismat Kharab Hoti Hai,
Har Waqt Inteha Ki Ghadi Sath Hoti Hai,
Waqt Mile To Rishto Ki Kitab Khol Ke Dekh Lena,
Dosti Har Rishtey Se Lajawab Hoti Hai…

st: Koi Khud Se Bhi Pyaara Hota Hai,
s:
Koi Khud Se Bhi Pyaara Hota Hai,
Koi To Dil Ka Sahara Hota Hai,
Jaruri Nahi Zindagi Apne Liye Hi Pyaari Ho,
Zindagi Mein Koi To Zindagi Se Bhi Pyaara Hota Hai…

st: Har Kadam Par Imtihaan Leti Hai Zindagi,
s:
Har Kadam Par Imtihaan Leti Hai Zindagi,
Har Waqt Naya Sadma Deti Hai Zindagi,
Hum Zindagi Se Kya Shikwa Kare,
Aap Jaise Dost Bhi To Deti Hai Zindagi…

st: Kuchh Fasle Sirf Aankhon Se Hote Hai,
s:
Kuchh Fasle Sirf Aankhon Se Hote Hai,
Dil Ke Fasle Do Bato Se Hote Hai,
Koi Lakh Bhulane Ki Koshish Kare,
Par Dosti Ke Ristey Khatam Sirf Saason Se Hote Hai…

st: Dunia Se Jene Ke Bhane Hazar Hote Hai,
s:
Dunia Se Jene Ke Bhane Hazar Hote Hai,
Jo Jete Hai Bena Dosti Ke Wo Bekar Hote Hai,
Jo Karte Hai Sacchi Dosti Ki Kadr,
Bus Wahi Is Dosti Ke Haqdar Hote Hai…

st: Dosti Nazron Se Ho To Usse Kudrat Kahete Hai,
s:
Dosti Nazron Se Ho To Usse Kudrat Kahete Hai,
Sitaron Se Ho Toh Jannat Kahete Hai,
Aankhon Se Ho Toh Mohabbat Kahete Hai,
Aur Dosti Aap Se Ho Toh Kismat Kahete Hai…

st: Waqt Bhaut Kam Hai Sath Bitane Ke Liye,
s:
Waqt Bhaut Kam Hai Sath Bitane Ke Liye,
Isko Na Gawana Kabhi Ruthne Manane Ke Liye,
Dosti To Humne Kar Li Aap Se,
Bas Thoda Sa Sath Dena Es Ko Nibhane Ke Liye..

st: Tujhe Dekhe Bina Teri Tasweer Bana Sakta Hoon,
s:
Tujhe Dekhe Bina Teri Tasweer Bana Sakta Hoon,
Tujhse Mile Bina Tera Haal Bata Sakta Hoon,
Hai Meri Dosti Mein Itna Dum,
Apni Aankh Ka Aansu Teri Aankh Se Gira Sakta Hoon…

st: Dosti Mein Dooriyan To Aati Rehti Hain,
s:
Dosti Mein Dooriyan To Aati Rehti Hain,
Phir Bhi Dosti Dilo Ko Mila Deti Hai,

Wo Dost Hi Kya Jo Naraz Na Ho,
Per Sachi Dosti Dosto Ko Mana Leti Hai…

st: Hasi Ke Raste Pe Chala Karo,
s:
Hasi Ke Raste Pe Chala Karo,
Khushiyo Ki Mahak Liya Karo,

Pyar Se Dilon Ko Chuha Karo,
Jahan Tumhe Gum Nazar Aaye,

Is Nacheez Ko Yaad Kiya Karo,
Har Kali Tujhse Khushboo Udhar Mange,

Aftab Tujhse Noor Udhar Mange,
Rab Kare Tu Dosti Aisi Nibhaye Ki Log Teri Dosti Udhar Mange…

st: Zindagi Ke Tohfan Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti,
s:
Zindagi Ke Tohfan Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti,
Dil Ke Armaano Ki Manzil Hai Teri Dosti,
Zindagi Ban Jayegi Jannat,
Agar Sada Saath Rahegi Teri Dosti…

st: Hothon Pe Dosti Ke Fasane Nahi Aate,
s:
Hothon Pe Dosti Ke Fasane Nahi Aate,
Sahil Pe Samandar Ke Khazane Nahi Aate,

Udne Do Parindon Ko Abhi Shokh Hawa Mein,
Fir Laut Kar College Ke Zamane Nahi Aate…

st: Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
s:
Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
Dil Tumse Milne Ko Beqaraar Hota Hai
Tum Hamse Milo Na Milo
Phir Bhi is Dil Main Teri Dosti Ka Pyar Rehta Hai…

st: Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
s:
Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
Toot Jata Hai Dil Jab Bai Nahi Hoti
Teri Jaan Ki Kasam A Dost
Jab Tu Yad Na Aye
Aisi Koi Shaam Nahi Hoti…

st: Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
s:
Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
Dil Na Chah Kar Bhi Khamosh Rahe Jata Hai
Koi Sab Kuch Kehkar Dosti Jatata Hai
To Koi Kuch Na Keh Kar Bhi Dosti Nibhata Hai…

st: Teri Dosti Hum Iss Tarh Nibhaynge
s:
Teri Dosti Hum Iss Tarh Nibhaynge
Tum Roj Ruth Jana Hum Roj Manaynge
Per Maan Jana Jab Hum Manaynge
Nahi To Hum Waha Chale Jaynge
Jaha Se Mudke Kabhi Na Aayenge…

st: Chand Se Pyari Chandni
s:
Chand Se Pyari Chandni
Chandni Se Pyari Raat
Raat Se Pyari Jindgi
Jindgi Se Pyari Aap Ho..

st: Dosti Ka Safar Bhi Kitna Suhana Hota Hai
s:
Dosti Ka Safar Bhi Kitna Suhana Hota Hai
Kabhi Hasna To Kabhi Rulana Hota Hai

Dil To Kehta Hai Sath Rahe Zindagi Bhar Lekin
Sabhi Ko Ek Din Bichad Jana Hota Hai…

st: De Rahe Hain Mere Apne Jahar, Ke Sagar Mujhe,
s:
De Rahe Hain Mere Apne Jahar, Ke Sagar Mujhe,
Lag Raha Hai Aaj Apna Ghar Paraya Ghar Mujhe,
Dosto Ka Yeh Tarika Ho Gaya Hai Aajkal,
Chheen Lete Hain Khusi Jakham Dikhakar Mujhe…

st: Hai Chiragon Ki Tarah Jalta Hua Mera Vajud,
s:
Hai Chiragon Ki Tarah Jalta Hua Mera Vajud,
Woh Hua Khush Andhere Mein Pakar Mujhe,

Main Toh Sone Ki Karta Raha Koshish Magar,
Khud Hawaon Ne Jagaaya Lori Ga Gakar Mujhe….

st: Ishq Mohabbat Toh Hazaron Karte Hain,
s:
Ishq Mohabbat Toh Hazaron Karte Hain,
Gham E Judai Se Woh Sabhi Darte Hain,

Hum Toh Na Ishq Karte Hain, Na Mohabbat Karte Hain,
Hum Toh Bas Dosto Ki Ek Muskurahat Par Marte Hain….

st: Chup Rahte Hain Ke Koi Khata Na Ho Jaaye,
s:
Chup Rahte Hain Ke Koi Khata Na Ho Jaaye,
Humse Koi Ruswa Na Ho Jaaye,

Badi Muskil Se Koi Apna Bana Hai,
Milne Se Pahle Hi Juda Na Ho Jaaye…

st: Dosti Ka Farz Yun Hi Nibhate Rahenge,
s:
Dosti Ka Farz Yun Hi Nibhate Rahenge,
Vakt Bevakt Aapko Satate Rahenge,

Dua Karo Ke Umar Lambi Ho Hamari,
Varna Yaad Ban Ke Aapko Satate Rahenge….

st: Mujhe Kah Do Tum Alwida Yaaro,
s:
Mujhe Kah Do Tum Alwida Yaaro,
Mujhe Lout Ke Aane Ko Mat Kahna,

Yeh Kasam Hai Tumko Meri Yaaro,
Tum Mere Liye Dukhi Mat Rahna…

st: Kaash Hamara Bhi Hota Dost Koi,
s:
Kaash Hamara Bhi Hota Dost Koi,
Hamara Jaadu Bhi Kisi Par Chal Pata,

Kabhi Mujhko Bhi Deta Moula Himaat,
Yeh Sagar Bhi Dil Ki Kah Pata…

st: Sach Hai Mujhe Kisi Ki Bhi Pahchan Nahi,
s:
Sach Hai Mujhe Kisi Ki Bhi Pahchan Nahi,
Dost Ke Roop Mein Sada Hi Dushman Mile,

Mere Hisse Toh Aaye Hain Sada Hi Kaante,
Phool Na Jaane Kiski Bagiya Mein Khile…

st: Dhund Kar Hum Thak Chuke Hain Dost Mere,
s:
Dhund Kar Hum Thak Chuke Hain Dost Mere,
Koun Si Galiyon Mein Jaane Tum Kho Gaye,

Ab Aur Kahan Thikana Hai Is Gareeb Ka,
Jakar Tabhi Kabr Mein Hum So Gaye…

st: Zamane Wale Mil Gaye Hain Sabhi Ek Doosre Se,
s:
Zamane Wale Mil Gaye Hain Sabhi Ek Doosre Se,
Milkar Sabhi Ne Mujh Akele Ko Mara Hai,

Tu Bhi Mat Ho Jana Bewafa Sabhi Ki Tarah,
Eh Mere Dost Sagar Ko Bas Tera Sahara Hai…

st: Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
s:
Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
Magar Dil Mera Yeh Manta Hi Nahi,

Humne Toh Dekhi Hai Bewafayi Aapki,
Aap Bewafa Ho Dil Jaanta Hi Nahi….

st: Chand Toh Aata Hai Roj Raaton Ko Magar ,
s:
Chand Toh Aata Hai Roj Raaton Ko Magar ,
Na Jaane Chandani Ko Kyun Saath Le Aata Hai,

Bahut Koshish Ki Use Bhulane Ki Magar,
Fir Bhi Jaane Kyun Woh Dost Bahut Yaad Aata Hai…

st: Aise Hi Rakhna Mujhko Eh Mere Khuda,
s:
Aise Hi Rakhna Mujhko Eh Mere Khuda,
Meri Dosti Sada Aise Hi Paak Rahe,

Sagar Mar Bhi Jaaye Koi Gham Na Ho,
Marne Ke Baad Sada Doston Ko Yaad Rahe…

st: Yahan Koun Rota Hai Kisi Ke Liye Sagar,
s:
Yahan Koun Rota Hai Kisi Ke Liye Sagar,
Sab Apni Hi Kisi Baat Par Rote Hain,

Yahan Milta Hai Sachha Saathi Muskil Se,
Baaki Toh Sab Matlab Ke Yaar Hote Hain…

st: Humne Toh Kaha Tha Aapse Eh Mere Dost,
s:
Humne Toh Kaha Tha Aapse Eh Mere Dost,
Ki Aap Humse Dosti Nibha Na Paaoge,

Aap Toh Shayad Bhool Bhi Jaaoge Hamein,
Magar Sagar Ko Aap Hamesha Yaad Aaoge…

st: Jis Gull Ki Tamanna Thi Hamein Zindagi Mein,
s:
Jis Gull Ki Tamanna Thi Hamein Zindagi Mein,
Shayad Woh Gull Kisi Gulistaa Mein Khila Nahi,

Jaise Dost Ki Tamanna Thi Hamein Zindagi Mein,
Vaisa Dost Hamein Kabhi Aajj Tak Mila Nahi…

st: Khush Raho Aap Eh Mere Dost Sada Yun Hi,
s:
Khush Raho Aap Eh Mere Dost Sada Yun Hi,
Zindagi Hoti Bhi Khusiyon Ko Paane Ke Liye Hai,

Magar Sagar Ke Baare Mein Na Puchhna Aap Kabhi,
Is Ki Zindagi Toh Bas Jamane Ke Liye Hai…

st: Wafa Sabse Karne Ka Hamein Yeh Sila Mila,
s:
Wafa Sabse Karne Ka Hamein Yeh Sila Mila,
Humko Is Jamane Se Hamesha Gila Mila,

Ab Aur Kya Kahu Main Aapse Eh Mere Dosto,
Hamein Toh Jo Bhi Dost Mila Bewafa Mila…

st: Yeh Maana Ke Hum Garib Hain Eh Duniya Walon,
s:
Yeh Maana Ke Hum Garib Hain Eh Duniya Walon,
Magar Hamein Bhi Ek Dost Banane Ki Izaazat De Do,

Yeh Maana Ki Hamein Khusiyan Maangane Ka Hak Nahi Hai,
Magar Us Dost Ke Gham Apnaane Ki Izaazat De Do…

st: Tum Bhi Thukra Do Ab Mujhko,
s:
Tum Bhi Thukra Do Ab Mujhko,
Main Hun Hi Is Kaabil Eh Dost,

Nahi Koi Achhayi Paas Mere,
Mujh Mein Toh Hain Bas Dosh Hi Dosh…

st: Bas Ik Tamanna Hai Baaki,
s:
Bas Ik Tamanna Hai Baaki,
Agar Maan Le Yeh Khuda Mera,

Jise Mujhse Kiya Tha Door Kabhi,
Woh Bichhuda Yaar Mila De Mera…

st: Kya Bataaye Aapko Eh Mere Aziz Dost,
s:
Kya Bataaye Aapko Eh Mere Aziz Dost,
Ki Apni Zindagi Ke Din Hum Kaise Katate Hain,

Logon Ne Toh Diye Hain Hamein Jakham Hardam,
Magar Hum Na Jaane Kyu Khusiyan Hi Bantate Hain…

st: Tum Kya Sochte Ho,
s:
Tum Kya Sochte Ho,
Kya Dekhte Ho,
Kya Janate Ho Mere Baare Mein,
Jis Cheez Ke Liye Tum Mujhe Chahte Ho,
Main Wahi Karta Hun,
Sirf Apna Kaam,
Dilo Jaan Se,
Jiske Liye,
Tum Mere Jaisa Banna Chahate Ho….

st: Aapki Khusiyon Ki Tamanna Nahi Hai Hamein,
s:
Aapki Khusiyon Ki Tamanna Nahi Hai Hamein,
Hum Toh Aapke Gham Ko Apnana Chahte Hain,

Aap Ko Jab Samajh Liya Hai Dost Apna,
Hum Toh Bas Yeh Dosti Nibhana Chahte Hain…

st: Aaj Socha Hai Yeh Sagar Ne Ki,
s:
Aaj Socha Hai Yeh Sagar Ne Ki,
Kyu Na Zindagi Ko Aajmayein Hum,

Dushman Toh Bahut Banakar Dekh Liye,
Kyu Na Ab Ek Dost Banayein Hum…

st: Hum Khus Hain Yarab Ab Apni Is Zindagi Se,
s:
Hum Khus Hain Yarab Ab Apni Is Zindagi Se,
Jismein Hamein Aap Jaisa Ek Dost Mila Hai,

Hamari Zindagi Ke Gulshan Mein Thi Patjhad Magar,
Aaj Is Gulistaa Mein Bhi Ek Phool Khila Hai…

st: Dost Na Samjha Kya Hua, Dushman Hi Sahi,
s:
Dost Na Samjha Kya Hua, Dushman Hi Sahi,
Hum, Dushmani Bhi, Unko Nibhakar Dikhayenge,

Unhone Jo Manga Hai, Hamare Pyar Ke Badle,
Aap Dekhna, Hum Jaan Bhi Unko De Jaayenge…

st: Tumko Samjhaata Hu Isliye Eh Dost,
s:
Tumko Samjhaata Hu Isliye Eh Dost,
Kyuki Sabko Hi Aajma Chuka Hu Main,

Kahin Tumko Bhi Pachhtana Na Pade Yahan,
Kyonki Hasino Se Dhokha Kha Chuka Hu Main…

st: Na Khusi De Toh Kuchh Dilasha,
s:
Na Khusi De Toh Kuchh Dilasha,
Dost Jaise Ho Mujhko Bahla De,

Chetna Se Mili Hai Tanhai,
Aa Meri Jaan Mujhko Dhoka De,

Ab Toh Poorti Ki Bhi Shart Nahi,
Zindagi Ab Toh Ek Tamanna De,

Eh Safar Itna Bekar To Na Jaa,
Na Ho Manjil Kahin Toh Pahuncha De,

Tark Karna Hai Gar Taallk Toh,
Khud Na Jaa Tu Kisi Se Kahla De…

st: Woh gajal ki jaise hiran ki aankho mein
s:
Woh gajal ki jaise hiran ki aankho mein
Pichhali raat ki chandni,

Na bujhe viran ki roshni
Kabhi bechirag yeh ghar na ho,

Kabhi din ki dhup mein jhum kar
Kabhi raat ke phool ko choom kar,

st: Teri Aankhon Mein Aisa Sanvar Jaaun Main,
s:
Teri Aankhon Mein Aisa Sanvar Jaaun Main,
Umar Bhar Aaino Ki Jarurat Na Ho,

Kis Ko Nilaam Karte Ho Baazar Mein,
Yeh Kisi Ghar Ke Mandir Ki Moorat Na Ho,

Dosti Ke Tarike Jaan Na Chahiye,
Husn Chahe Bahut Khusurat Na Ho,

Din Toh Nikla Kharida Hua Aadmi,
Eh Khuda Raat Bhi Sabki Aurat Na Ho,

Chhapron Par Diye Rakh Gayi Hai Hawa,
Taki Fir Roshni Ki Sikayat Na Ho…

st: Ek Samandar Ke Pyase Kinare The Hum,
s:
Ek Samandar Ke Pyase Kinare The Hum,
Apna Paigam Lati Thi Mouj E Ravaa,

Aaj Do Rail Ki Patriyon Ki Tarah,
Sath Chalna Hai Aur Bolna Tak Nahin,

Lakdiyon Se Tarashi Huyi Ladkiyan,
Tin Ke Nojavaan Mukhtlif Rang Mein,

Dost Hain Dosti Se Magar Bekhabar,
Jaan E Dushman Hainlekin Khafa Tak Nahin,

Kesriya Rang Ke Gesuon Ki Ghata,
Aasmaa Rang Ke Kot Par Chha Gayi,

Narm Yaadon Ke Fariston Ke Parr,
Dudhiya Khamushi Aur Hawa Tak Nahin…

st: Yeh Bahana Woh Bahana Mout Ka Bhi Kya Thikana,
s:
Yeh Bahana Woh Bahana Mout Ka Bhi Kya Thikana,
Beej Se Jangal Ugakar Gul Khilana Gul Jhadana,

Khaatme Ka Sabab Hai Jo Us Se Asli Hai Dostana,
Bhid Ke Beech Ki Saajish Haadson Ka Sir Uthana,

Char Din Ki Jindgani Kya Kisi Ka Dil Dukhana,
Karishma Hai Sabse Achha Aadmi Ka Khil Khilana,

Thoda Thoda Sabki Khatir Apne Andar Kuchh Bachana,
Faksafa Hai Ek Yeh Bhi Raham Karna Bhool Jana…

st: Aadmi Man Maniyon Ka Shikar Hai,
s:
Aadmi Man Maniyon Ka Shikar Hai,
Lobh Ka Putla Hai Jhoota Yaar Hai,

Kitane Kisse Chal Rahe Hain Bewafa Ke,
Lootne Walon Ki Toh Sarkar Hai,

Kahan Kitani Najar Rakhega Jamana,
Hawaon Se Uljhana Bekar Hai,

Dekha Bariki Se Tab Yeh Jaan Paaye,
Dost Apna Choro Ka Sardar Hai,

Dhire Dhire Rengati Duniya Hamari,
Dogalon Ki Kya Gajab Raftar Hai…

st: Abhi Baki Bacha Hai Thoda Safar,
s:
Abhi Baki Bacha Hai Thoda Safar,
Chalo Hon Kurban Fir Se Kisi Par,

Kaatni Toh Padegi Hi Jindgani,
Buhari Jaay Kisi Ki Rahgujar,

Dosti Ke Phool Dharti Par Khile,
Hansaye Toh Mohabbat Wali Najar,

Yaar Bachpan Ka Nahin Milta Hai Ab,
Par Sabhi Mein Toh Usi Jaise Hunar,

Khak Mein Toh Milega Sab Ek Din,
Jab Talak Jinda Hain Tabtalak Toh Nikhar…

st: Dost Bhi Zindagi Hai Aur Dushman Bhi,
s:
Dost Bhi Zindagi Hai Aur Dushman Bhi,
Nark Ki Galiyan Hai Kabhi Chilman Bhi,

Nayi Nayi Hain Manjile Naye Naye Sapne,
Aakhiri Raat Shyah Kabhi Surkh Dulhan Bhi,

Saanp Ko Doodh Pilate Huye Sapera Mara,
Jahar Ki Thaliyan Rakhta Hai Dudhmuha Fan Bhi,

Apn Shaya Bhi Saath De Kab Tak,
Sagi Saheliyo Mein Koi Ek Soutan Bhi…

st: Khat Mein Likhe Huye Ranjish Ke Kalaam Yaad Aate Hain,
s:
Khat Mein Likhe Huye Ranjish Ke Kalaam Yaad Aate Hain,
Kis Kayamat Ke Yeh Naame Mere Naam Aate Hain,

Tab E Nazaara Kise Dekhe Jo Unke Jalwe,
Bijliyan Kondhati Hain Jab Lam E Baam Aate Hain,

To Sahi Hasr Mein Tujh Se Jo Na Yeh Kahlwa Doo,
Dost Woh Hote Hain Jo Vakt Pe Kaam Aate Hain,

Sabr Karta Hai Kabhi Aur Tadpata Hai Kabhi,
Dil E Naakam Ko Apne Yeh Hi Kaam Aate Hain…

st: Hum Phool Hain Gulab Sahi,
s:
Hum Phool Hain Gulab Sahi,
Daaman Kaanto Ne Thama Hai,

Apno Ne Hamein Thukraya Hai,
Haath Gairo Ne Thama Hai,

Roti Hai Aaj Hum Par Tanhai Humari,
Woh Bhi Na Paaye Shayad Parchhayi Humaari,

Tumhaari Dosti Ko Dekhkar Sabhi Rask Karta Hain,
Jo Bas Chalta To Duniya Chin Leti Zindagi Teri…

st: Khat Aapka Padha, Din Chakna Chur Ho Gaya,
s:
Khat Aapka Padha, Din Chakna Chur Ho Gaya,
Meri Aakhari Namaste, Main Majboor Ho Gaya,

Na Likhenge Khat Hum Aaj Ke Baad,
Yeh Socha Hai Humne Ro Ro Ke Aaj,

Karke Yaad Aapko Yun Hi Jiya Karenge,
Yeh Socha Hai Humne Ghut Ghut Ke Mara Karenge,

Bina Hasino Ke Hi Gujar Yeh Zindagi Karna,
Hasino Ki Dosti Se Achha Hai Khudkhusi Karnak…

st: Dost Bahut Hain Lekein,
s:
Dost Bahut Hain Lekein,
Har Dost Dil Ke Kareeb Hote Nahi,

Jo Sachha Dost Hai,
Woh Kabhi Gham Deta Nahi,

Dil Kehta Hai Ek Din,
Khushi Tere Kadam Chumegi,

Bharosa Rakhna Kismat Par,
Kyun Ki Kismat Bewafa Hote Nahi…

st: Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
s:
Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
Dard Sahna Sikha Diya,

Marti Huyi Rooh Ko Jeena Sikha Diya,
Kya Kahun Kya Hai Tera Saath Mere Liye,

Tere Saath Ne,
Mere Aansuo Ko Muskurana Sikha Diya…

st: Woh Eik Dost,
s:
Woh Eik Dost,
Jo Pyara Sa,
Lagta Hai,
Bahut Pass Hai,
Dil Ke Phir Bhi,
Juda Sa Lagta Hai,
Bahut Dino Se Aaya,
Nahi Koi Paigam Uska,
Shayad Kisi Baat Pe,
Khafa Sa Lagta Hai…

st: Teri Dosti Hum Is Tarah Se Nibhayenge,
s:
Teri Dosti Hum Is Tarah Se Nibhayenge,
Tum Roj Ruth Jaana ,
Hum Roj Manayenge,

Par Maan Jana Jab Hum Manayenge,
Nahin Toh Hum Vahan Chale Jayenge,
Jahaa Se Mudkar Kabhi Na Aayenge…

st: Dil Se Likhi Baat,
s:
Dil Se Likhi Baat,
Dil Ko Chhu Jati Hai,

Yeh Aksar Ankahi Baat,
Kah Jaati Hai,

Kuchh Log Dosti Ke,
Maayne Badal Dete Hain,

Aur Kuchh Logon Ki Dosti,
Yeh Duniya Badal Jaati Hai…

st: Tumhara Hamaara Rista To,
s:
Tumhara Hamaara Rista To,
Aankh Aur Palko Jaisa Hai,

Agar Palak Kuchh Der Na Jhapke,
To Aankh Ro Deti Hai,

Aur Agar Aankh Mein Kuchh Chala Jaaye,
To Palak Tadap Udhti Hai…

st: Aaj Hai Kal Na Jaane Kahan Hoge,
s:
Aaj Hai Kal Na Jaane Kahan Hoge,
Hum Woh Parindey Hai,

Joh Aasman Mai Kho Jaayege,
Dosti Ki Dor Se Baand Kar Rakhna Hume,

Kal Na Honge To,
Bohot Yaad Aayege…

st: Dil Ka Zhatka,
s:
Dil Ka Zhatka,
Aankho Ka Phatka,

Aasman Se Tapka,
Zameen Pe Patka,

Aiso Ko Dost Kahate Hain…

st: Hum Se Puchho Kya Hota Hai Pal Pal Bitaana,
s:
Hum Se Puchho Kya Hota Hai Pal Pal Bitaana,
Bahut Muskil Hota Hai Dil Ko Samjhana,

Yaar Zindagi Toh Beet Jaayegi,
Bas Muskil Hota Hai Kuchh Dosto Ko Bhool Jaana…

st: Zindagi Bahut Choti Hai,
s:
Zindagi Bahut Choti Hai,
Samay Ko Har Vaqt Khoti Hai,

Kucgg Vakt Dosto Ke Saath Bhi Bitaya Karo,
Kyon Ki Yeh Dosti Ki Yaad Mein Roti Hai…

st: Kuchh Saalon Baad Naa Jane Kya Samaa Hoga,
s:
Kuchh Saalon Baad Naa Jane Kya Samaa Hoga,
Najaane Kon Dost Kahaa Hoga,

Fir Milna Hua To Milenge Yaadon Mein,
Jaise Sukhe Gulab Milte Hain Kitabon Mein…

st: Dost Dost Se Khafa Nahin Hota,
s:
Dost Dost Se Khafa Nahin Hota,

Pyar Pyar Se Juda Nahin Hota,

Bhula Dena Meri Kuch Kamiyon Ko,

Kyonki Insaaan Kabhi Khuda Nahi Hota…

st: Dosti Se Badi Koi Jaagir Nahin Hoti,
s:
Dosti Se Badi Koi Jaagir Nahin Hoti,

Is Se Achhi Koi Tasveer Nahin Hoti,

Ek Pyar Ka Naajuk Sa Dhaga Hai Dosti,

Fir Bhi Iss Se Pakki Koi Janjeer Nahin Hoti…

st: Jeene Ki Nayi Adaa Di Hai,
s:
Jeene Ki Nayi Adaa Di Hai,

Khush Rahne Ki Usne Dua Di Hai,

Ah Khuda Mere Doston Ko Salamat Rakhna,

Jinhone Apne Dil Mein Mujhe Jagah Di Hai…

st: Yaado Ke Sahaare Duniya Nahin Chalti,
s:
Yaado Ke Sahaare Duniya Nahin Chalti,

Bina Kisi Shaayar Ke mahfil Nahin Banti,

Eik baar Pukaro Toh Doston,

Kyonki Dosti Ke Bina Yeh Zindagi Nahin Chalti…

st: Zindagi Mein Kuchh Dost Khas Ban Gaye,
s:
Zindagi Mein Kuchh Dost Khas Ban Gaye,

Mile Toh Mulakat Aur Bichde Toh Yaad Ban Gaye,

Kuchh Dost Dheere Dheere Fislate Chale Gaye,

Par Jo Dil Se Na Gaye Woh Aap Ban Gaye…

st: Har Yaad Mein,
s:
Har Yaad Mein,
Apki Yaad Rahti Hai,

Hamaari Ankhon Mein ,
Aap Ki Talaash Rahti Hai,

Kuch Hamaare Liye,
Aap Bhi Dua Karna,

Suna Hai Dosti Ki Duaon Mein,
Faristo Ki Awaaz Rahti Hai…

st: Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,
s:
Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,

Jo Main Tumpe Marta Hun,

Har Samay Tere Aane Ka,

Intezaar Karta Hun,

Naa Koi Gilla Hai Tumse,

Isiliye Toh Main Har Roj,

Tumhare Liye Khuda Se Dua Karta Hun…

st: Naa Rokar Dosti Khatam Karenge,
s:
Naa Rokar Dosti Khatam Karenge,

Naa Dooriyon Se Apanapan Kam Karenge.

Hamaari Dosti Mein Hai Saagar Si Gahrai,

Chahkar Bhi Naa Hum Gahrai Kam Karenge…

st: Dosti Se Aaj Pyaar Sharmaaya Hai,
s:
Dosti Se Aaj Pyaar Sharmaaya Hai,
Aapki Dosti Ne Hamein Jeena Sikhaaya Hai
Kya Maange Khuda Se Hum,
Woh To Khud, Aaj Mere Dar Par,

Apki Dosti Mangne Aaya Hai…

st: Yeh Zaraa Zaraa Si Baat Par,
s:
Yeh Zaraa Zaraa Si Baat Par,
Tarha Tarha Ka Azaab Kyon,

Jo Kisi Se Bhi Khafaa Naa Ho,
Mujhe Us Dost Ki Talaash Hai

Mujhe Laghzishon Par Har Ghadi,
Koi Tokta Hai Baar Baar,

Jise Kar Ke Dil Ko Dukh Naa Ho,
Mujhe Us Gunaah Ki Talaash Hai…

st: Bas EIk Zaraa Khayaal Is Dost Ka Tha,
s:
Bas EIk Zaraa Khayaal Is Dost Ka Tha,

Warna Bahut Gila Teri Berukhi Ka Tha,

Mujhko Lagaa Main Bhi Teri Zindgi Mein Hoon,

Par Yeh Toh Koi Dhoka Meri Saadgi Ka Tha…

st: Pani Na Ho To Nadiyan Kis Kam Ki
s:
Pani Na Ho To Nadiyan Kis Kam Ki
Aansu Na Ho To Aankhen Kis Kam Ki
Dil Na Ho To Dhadkan Kis Kam Ki
Agar Main Apko Yaad Na Karun To
Hamari Yeh Dosti Kis Kam Ki…

st: Gull Voh Jo Gulshan Ko Apni Khushboo Se Mahakaa De,
s:
Gull Voh Jo Gulshan Ko Apni Khushboo Se Mahakaa De,
Sitaara Voh Jo Apni Roshni Se Aasmaan Ko Chamka De,
Rishte Voh Jo Zindagi Jeene Ka Pyaara Sa Ahsaas Jagaa De,
Aur Saccha Dost Voh Jo Hamaari Zindagi Ko Khushiyo Se Sajaa De…

st: Dil Kee Zarurat Har Jaan Ko Hotee Hai ,
s:
Dil Kee Zarurat Har Jaan Ko Hotee Hai ,
Taaron Kee Zarurat Har Aasman Ko Hotee Hai,
Dua Karte Hain Ham Ke Salaamat Rahen Aap,
Kyon Ki,
Eik Achhe Dost Kee Jarurat Har Insaan Ko Hotee Hai…

st: Sitaro Ke Bageir Aasman Mein Rakha Kya Hai,
s:
Sitaro Ke Bageir Aasman Mein Rakha Kya Hai,
Bina Tere Jeene Mein Rakha Kya Hai,
Lagta Hai Sab Kuchh Adhura Sa Hai,
Dosti Ke Bageir Duniya Mein Rakha Kya Hai…

st: Saath Deta Jo Samay Aap Hamare Hote,
s:
Saath Deta Jo Samay Aap Hamare Hote,
Hum Bhi Doosro Ki Tarah Aapke Pyare Hote,
Ye  Mere Aansu Jinhe Ponchhne Vala Bhi Nahi Koi,
Aanchal Inhe Milta To Sitare Hote …

st: Hasi bhi mili or khushi bhi mili,
s:
Hasi bhi mili or khushi bhi mili,
socha bahut khushnasib hain hum,
magar jab apne pyare dost ko,
ek muskurahat na de sake,
tab pata chala ki kitne garib hain hum…

st: Chand ka kya kahena wo to lakho mein ek hai,
s:
Chand ka kya kahena wo to lakho mein ek hai,
Aap ka kya kahena aap to karodo mein ek hai,
Apni dosti ka kya kahena wo to khuda se bhi nek hai…

st: Aasman se utari hai,
s:
Aasman se utari hai,
Taron se sajai hai,
Chand ki chandni se nehlai hai,
Mere dosti sambhaal ke rakhna yeh dosti,
Yeh meri zindagi bhar ki kamai hai…

st: Log puchhate he aksar
s:
Log puchhate he aksar
mere mohabbat k kisse,
Esa nahi hai ki hamane mohbbat nahi ki
magar E dost,
itni siddat se ki wo yaad raha sab bhul gae…

st: Zindagi me Jab Maayus hue Hum,
s:
Zindagi me Jab Maayus hue Hum,
To Socha k kya paaya kya khoya,
Khone ka to hisaab na laga paaye,
Yaad raha to bas itna…ke,
Zindagi se bhi pyara..Aap jaisa Ek dost Paaya…

st: Sanson Se Pyari Yaadein Hai Tumhari
s:
Sanson Se Pyari Yaadein Hai Tumhari
Dhadkan Se Pyari Baatein Hai Tumhari
Tumhe Yakeen Ho Ya Na Ho
Is Zindagi Se Pyari Dosti Hai Tumhari…

st: baar baar dhundhne se bhi raah milti nahi
s:
baar baar dhundhne se bhi raah milti nahi
pyar kise kahu ab is dil ko pyar hota hi nahi
dard hota hai waha jab chot bharti hi nahi
haal janoge tum kaise ruh roti bhi nahi
ek pal jo kehna chahe mere dil ki dastan
teri saanse meri saanso ko bhala sunti nahi
hasti hu phir roti hu, rote hue so jati hukaun hu,
jane kyu sari baate phir hoti nahi…

st: Aap Ki Dosti Ka Sila Her Haal Mein Denge,
s:
Aap Ki Dosti Ka Sila Her Haal Mein Denge,
Koi Maange Ye Dosti To Usey Taal Denge,
Agar Dil Ne Kaha Ke Tum Bewafa Ho,
To Qasam Khuda Ki Dil Ko Bhi Seeney Se Nikaal Denge…

st: Dushman Se Kaho Dosti Na Kare,
s:
Dushman Se Kaho Dosti Na Kare,
Ab To Dost Hi Bda Dushman Hai,
Jo Haath Utha Karte The Dua Ko,
Un Haatho Me Abto Khanzar Hai,
Dushman Se Kaho Dosti Na Kare,
Wo Zamana Hai Ab Guzar Gaya,
Wafa Me Jan-E-Jigger Dene Ka,
Aaj Dost Bann Jo Daga De Sake,
Wahi Hai Dosti Ka Haq Ada Kare,
Dushman Se Kaho Dosti Na Kare,
Gar Wafa Karo Phir Dil Se Karo,
Dosti Karo To Jaan Dekar Karo,
“Sagar” To Wafa Ko Ibadat Samjhe,
Khuda Ki Terha Sabse Ulfat Kare,
Dushman Se Kaho Dosti Na Kare…

st: Hum Wo Nahi Jo Gham Me Chhod De,
s:
Hum Wo Nahi Jo Gham Me Chhod De,
Hum Wo Nahi Jo Tumse Nata Tod De.
Hum To Wo Hai,
Jo Hui Aapki Saanshein Khatam To Apni Jod De…

st: Pyar me koi to dil tod deta hai,
s:
Pyar me koi to dil tod deta hai,
Dosti me koi to bharosa tod deta hai,
Zindagi jeena to koi gulaab se sikhe,
Jo khud toot kar do dilo ko jod deta hai…

st: Dikhawey Ki Mohabbat se Behtar hai k Nafrat hi karo hamse,
s:
Dikhawey Ki Mohabbat se Behtar hai k Nafrat hi karo hamse,
Aye “Dost” …..
Sache Jazbon ki ham badi kadar kiya karte hai…

st: Bachpan bhi kya khoob hua karta tha,
s:
Bachpan bhi kya khoob hua karta tha,
dosti bhi pakki aur pyaar bhi sachha hua karta tha,
najaane kaise jawani ke rang mein badal gayi zindagi,
ab har jagah naraazgi aur saazishe hua karti hain…

st: Aao tumhe le jaun school ki un yaadon me,
s:
Aao tumhe le jaun school ki un yaadon me,
Jahan main ek nanhi ladki ke roop me aayi thi,
Is ajnabi padhai ki duniya mein koi na apna lagta tha,
Dheere-dheere pata nhi kaise sbko pehchaan-ne lagii aur sab apne bante chale gaye,
Yahi wo jagah jaha hme work na karne par dantt milti thi,
Yahi hai wo duniya jaha dosti ko dil se nibhaya jata tha,
Aur wo ashiyana jaha pyaar k afsaane hua karte the,
Hukum ho to likh dun har pal un yaadon ka,
Par hoga nahi mukammal silsila kahaniyon ka,
Ab maan b jao TaBaSsUm yaadon ka qatl kardo,
Kyun ke phir na laut aayenge ye pyaare din…

st: Aise na humko aajmao yaaro,
s:
Aise na humko aajmao yaaro,
kabhi to gale se lagao yaaro,
mana ye dunia gumon ka hai mela,
mager aise na humko tadpao yaaro,
mana ishq me usne apne layak na samjha,
dosto mein meri sakhsiyat batlao yaaro,
khafa kyun ho mujhse nadan hun main,
mujhe meri galti samjhao yaaro,
aise na humko aajmao yaaro,
kabhi to gale se lagao yaaro…

st: Har Khushi Dil Ke Kareeb Nhi Hoti,
s:
Har Khushi Dil Ke Kareeb Nhi Hoti,
Zindagi Ghamo Se Door Nhi Hoti,

Ae Dost, Dosti Ko Sambhal Kar Rakhna,
Kyunki Dosti Har Kisi Ko Naseeb Nhi Hoti…

st: kuch dost aise bhi mile mujhko
s:
kuch dost aise bhi mile mujhko
jo saath de na sake dosti nibha na sake…
ek hum bhi hain jo nibhaate hain is kadar,
unhe bhul na sake jo hame apna na sake…
is kadar khaya dhokha apne hi logon se,
k fir kabhi dosti ka haath badha na sake…
aye khuda baksh de har khushi unko,
jo “Rajan” ki khushiyon ko dekh ke muskura na sake…
